content.prompt: Which of the following contributed most significantly to the population trend in pre-Columbian Mexico described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Migration in pursuit of fertile lands
Trade and settlement resulting from maize cultivation
Low birth rates and high death tolls as a result of European diseases
Internal conflict between groups causing political instability

topic.text: 1.2: Native American Societies Before European Contact

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
